definition: cause to grow and differentiate in ways conforming to its natural development
details:
verb
- cause to grow and differentiate in ways conforming to its natural development
= example: cause to grow and differentiate in ways conforming to its natural development
= synonyms: make grow
- happen
= example: happen
= synonyms: operate
- be gradually disclosed or unfolded
- elaborate by the unfolding of a musical idea and by the working out of the rhythmic and harmonic changes in the theme
= example: elaborate by the unfolding of a musical idea and by the working out of the rhythmic and harmonic changes in the theme
- become technologically advanced
= example: become technologically advanced
= synonyms: modernize, modernise
- grow emotionally or mature
= example: grow emotionally or mature
= synonyms: grow
- gain through experience
= synonyms: acquire, evolve
- create by training and teaching
= synonyms: train, prepare, educate
- elaborate, as of theories and hypotheses
= example: elaborate, as of theories and hypotheses
= synonyms: explicate, formulate
- move into a strategically more advantageous position
= example: move into a strategically more advantageous position
- move one's pieces into strategically more advantageous positions
= example: move one's pieces into strategically more advantageous positions
- superimpose a three-dimensional surface on a plane without stretching, in geometry
- generate gradually
= example: generate gradually
- work out
= example: work out
= synonyms: evolve, germinate
- make something new, such as a product or a mental or artistic creation
= example: make something new, such as a product or a mental or artistic creation
- make visible by means of chemical solutions
= example: make visible by means of chemical solutions
- come into existence
= synonyms: rise
- come to have or undergo a change of (physical features and attributes)
= synonyms: get
- change the use of and make available or usable
= example: change the use of and make available or usable
- expand in the form of a series
- grow, progress, unfold, or evolve through a process of evolution, natural growth, differentiation, or a conducive environment
= example: grow, progress, unfold, or evolve through a process of evolution, natural growth, differentiation, or a conducive environment
